name: Love Villa: Choose Your Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Makeover Date: Makeup ASMR
description: Different stories from different characters, transform from boring to fascinating, from desperation to brilliance, by changing appearances through makeup!

name: MatchMe: My Secret Crush
description: Dive into your second life where you can swipe, match, date, and flirt. Find your perfect match!

name: Magic: The Boys Who Love Me
description: A serendipitous and thrilling encounter unveils the gateway to a magical world! Once you are found on a half-naked sexy boy, you are invited to the most famous collage in the magical world, CMS. Yet, your life seems to pose its own set of challenges without any magic. Fret not, for helping you seamlessly assimilate into the magical tapestry of existence, 6 attractive boys— a prince, a vampire, a werewolf, a doctor, a elf and a dragon— stand ready to accompany you through a romantic adventure within CMS. Amidst the joyous days of romance and sexiness, crisis lurks like a shadow. As the secrets of the magical world gradually surface, so too does your own mysterious power. In this spellbinding journey, you will weave a tale of growth, love, and empowerment.

name: FictIf
description: Welcome, wonderer. You’ve found FictIf, a stunning collection of interactive, inclusive visual novels where you make the decisions.

name: Immortal Diaries
description: A new beauty studio has opened in Rose City to freshen up your look! Have a blast experimenting with stunning makeovers for different characters, and don’t forget to claim rewards upon successful attempts.

name: Age of Castles: Snake War
description: A group of brave knights embark on an adventurous journey, traversing castles and green meadows to challenge the mighty serpent. Establishing castles on the territory of the old empire, recruiting residents, forming alliances, and creating a new order for the empire!

name: Tycoon's Choice: My Secretary
description: Tycoon's Choice: My Secretary is a modern RPG simulation mobile game based on an exciting and immersive novel storyline. Recruit all the agents and explore the immersive and amazing dating experience with gorgeous babes, you will be the tycoon of this underworld city.

name: Ninja Warrior: Shadow of Samurai
description: RPG Fighting Action game brings you a new experience of free fighting style, are you ready to challenge this new turn based RPG!

name: Shadow Slayer
description: Hardcore Hack’n Slash Massive Action-RPG.

name: Shadow Knight: Ninja Game RPG
description: Unleash your shadow knight out of the shadow war by fighting against hordes of monsters and defeating them all. The cool Ninja Game - fighting game with shadow fighting style is waiting for you to explore. Be a fighter and fight the shadow war if you want to be the Legends of Shadow!

name: Mutant Llama
description: Unleash the beast within! In Mutant Llama, you'll breed and raise unique mutant llamas with powerful abilities. Train them to perfection, evolve their skills, and dominate the arena in epic battles!

name: John Man
description: John Man is an exciting offline single-player game. It belongs to the beat'em-up game genre, an action-packed genre that allows you to relax during your free time. It doesn't require an internet connection to play, so you can play it anywhere, anytime you want.

name: Shadow Slayer: Demon Hunter
description: Welcome to Shadow Slayer! Join our heroes' adventure in Foliga, a once happy and peaceful world turned dark. Undead bosses are now crowding everywhere. But this will end now! Stock up on epic hero powers to start the battle of the century today!

name: Demon Hunter
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow War: Idle RPG Survival
description: Shadow War: Idle RPG Survival is a dark and atmospheric idle RPG where you battle against hordes of monsters in the Shadow Realm. Choose from a variety of classes, each with its own unique skills and abilities, and embark on a journey to become the ultimate Shadow Slayer.

name: Guardian War
description: In your quest to save the princess, you will encounter challenging boss battles that require strategic planning and skillful execution.

name: Shadow Knight: Ninja Fighting
description: Hurry up and get the most stunning items and unique skins for free to equip your unique hero and fight to become Shadow Legends.

name: Idle Cannon: Tower TD Geometry
description: Step into the world of strategic brilliance and tower defense mastery!

name: Stick Survivor
description: Waking up on a strange Island. You have to try and survive the hordes of monsters coming toward you to put you back on your sleep again. Stick Legends Survival is one of those arena shooter roguelike games. Build your strongest hero by choosing the right traits and items and surviving the attack waves of monsters and bosses.

name: Fortias Saga
description:
Welcome to Fortias continent - the land of magic and mythical creatures.

In the 730th year according to the Eradel calendar, a war broke out between the human alliance and the dark forces across the land. To save humanity, you along with other heroes embark on an adventure through amazing worlds, explore dungeon, fight against hordes of monsters and the dark forces. Collect magical resources to enhance the power of your team and strengthen human defence by upgrading the stronghold. Throughout the adventure, you need to recruit new heroes and form the strongest team ever, together battle against powerful bosses.

name: Vulpin Adventures
description: Vulpin Adventure is 2D turn-based RPG fighting game that takes place in a fantasy setting. Player can increase various stats, equip different weapons and accessories, or paint the Vulpin different colors.

name: Eternal Match
description: A mobile Gladiator Competitive Multiplayer Game With character that inspired by the Greek Gods, you can Download it at Google Play, Soon be released at Steam

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Samidare ha Nibiiro no Shirabe
description: It had been raining for days. The days of the record heavy May rain continue. A past event told by a man who visited the Kyukawa detective agency to fulfill his promise he made 8 years ago.

name: Sokoblox
description: Sokoblox is a hybrid of two classic puzzle games: Sokoban (the push puzzle) and Bloxorz (the rolling block puzzle).

name: Redash
description:
After Marsho lent his game to a friend awhile back, Mo won't give it back now!
It's up to you find the Warp Stars and take it back even if force is needed.

name: Battle City Remake
description:
Battle City Remake is a remake of the original game produced and published by Namco at the year 1985. The game is a multi-directional shooter where you control a tank that must destroy all 20 enemies in each stage to advance to the next level. The enemy tanks on the other side attempt to destroy the player's base as well as the player.

The remake contains all the original 35 stages of the game, but with improved graphics. Like always the idea of our remake is improve the game visuals, but keep the gameplay the most close possible to the original game.

name: Orchid Labyrinth
description: When reunited with two girls who bear her likeness within a deep dream, will Dahlia finally figure out what she really wants? This is a short visual novel with a run time of about 30 minutes.

name: Melo's Nightmare
description:
Melo's Nightmare is a first-person perspective 3D escape horror game.
Players find themselves trapped in corridors and must investigate puzzles to attempt escape.
Fulfilling the conditions to escape hidden passageways will unlock the next door.
Activating or finding the correct puzzle triggers changes in the environment.

name: Feline Forensics and the Meowseum Mystery
description: There's only one detective to unravel this murder turned museum heist... and they're the cat's meow. Interrogate a "colorful" cast of suspects until they cough up hairballs... and the truth. Will you wrap up the case in time for an afternoon nap, and make injustice knead its last biscuit?

name: Detective Bass: Fish Out Of Water
description:
There has a murder on a luxurious cruise ship!

As the clever, wise, and handsome Detective Bass you must investigate 8 fish-people to decide who is responsible and put them behind bars.

name: The Case of Andrew D.
description: A forensic challenge - help private eye solve cases for their clients using OSINT and digital forensics techniques.

name: Zombie State
description: Experience the intensity of a brand-new post-apocalyptic zombie shooter adventure. Step into an infested world and brace yourself for heart-pounding zombie battles!

name: Gleep Gym
description:
Hi, human! Welcome to the Gleep Gym! Meet the other members and try to succeed in their challenges! Will your power level be enough to beat them??

Reach for the stars in this 00s flash inspired warioware-like ! This game was created as part of the GameDev.JS 2024 jam in 13 days with the theme 'POWER'. Thank you for playing Gleep Gym!

name: 攻城三国志
description: Sin descripción

name: Dune Dasher
description: Endless Desert Destruction

name: Cooking Simulator: Pizza
description: MAKE DELICIOUS PIZZA Prepare dough and sauces using authentic recipes, or mix various ingredients to come up with your own homemade concoctions. Bake 3 different sizes of pizza using a brick oven, and add a personal touch to every order with dozens of realistic ingredients! CAREER AND SANDBOX MODES Master the art of making pizza in Career mode. Decide which orders you want to fill and take your time to prepare the most delicious pizzas. Unlock new perks and ingredients and complete various quests focusing on different aspects of baking and serving pizza. Play the Sandbox mode to get instant access to all the ingredients and recipes and take as much time as you want to prepare whatever pizzas you can imagine! ITALIAN PIZZERIA Take control over a cozy Italian pizzeria consisting of 3 working areas: a fully-stocked pantry, a prep kitchen, and an oven area. The place looks stylish and has all the utensils and workspace you’ll need to master the art of crafting top-quality, authentic pizza!

name: Rogue Citadel
description: Unlock new defences, collect powerful items and create game-breaking synergies in this roguelite tower defence survivors game.

name: The Mermaid Mask
description:
In the pitch-black waters beyond a long-abandoned fishing town, the enigmatic captain of the world's strangest submarine has been murdered. Some say he was an immortal time-traveller. Others say he was a vampire, cursed to stay hidden beneath the waves forever...

Found alone in a locked room, with only an ancient stone cauldron to suggest how he might have died, it's up to Detective Grimoire and Sally to piece together what really happened. Was it a curse, released from the cauldron? One of the submarine's eccentric crew? Or does the bizarre truth run even deeper...

name: Sonic Mayhem
description: To celebrate the 20th anniversary of the release of Quake 2 comes this singleplayer unit based on a side-mission to Stroggos!

name: SambaSim
description: Sin descripción

name: Quake II: Sewer Jam Volume 1
description: Sewer levels are notoriously hard to get right. That’s why Andrew Yoder set out to challenge the Quake community to come up with good sewer levels all the way back in 2019. We wanted to do the same for the Quake 2 Remaster and that resulted in this package. Featuring nine new maps, a hub level and pre-rendered cutscenes. We hope you enjoy Map-Center’s Quake 2 Sewer Jam Volume 1.

name: Anime Story: Magical Princess
description: A great love simulation, dressup and otome game.

name: Jam Talk
description: It tells the story of a developer's very early beginnings and what video games mean to him.

name: Chiclana & Friends: The Game
description: Try to survive as many waves as possible with the best score in this game in which you control three characters at the same time.

name: Heian City Story
description:
A city-building sim with a historical twist
Travel back to olden times and become Director of your own city!
Attract new residents and try to become the greatest city in the land! Add buildings like restaurants and teahouses to make your town a place where samurai and commoners alike will want to live.

name: MediEvil
description:
The game takes place across a variety of levels, many of which require certain objectives to be performed to progress. Sir Daniel Fortesque can use a variety of weapons, consisting of close range weapons such as swords and clubs to long range weapons such as crossbows. Many of these weapons can be charged for a powerful attack and some weapons, such as the club, can be used to access areas that are otherwise inaccessible. When not possessing any items, Dan is able to rip his own arm off and use it for both melee and ranged attacks. Dan can equip a shield alongside weapons to defend against attacks; though they can only take several hits of damage before breaking. Throughout the game, Dan can visit gargoyle heads of two varieties; green ones offer Dan information while blue ones allow Dan to buy services or ammunition by using the treasures he finds.

Dan's health is determined by a single health bar, which reduces when Dan is hit. It will deplete completely if Dan drowns or falls from a great height. If Dan completely runs out of health, the game will end. Dan can extend his maximum health by collecting Life Bottles, which will automatically refill his health bar if it drops to zero. Also hidden throughout the game are Life Vials and Life Fountains that can replenish Dan's health and fill up any empty Life Bottles Dan has. In each level, there is a hidden Chalice of Souls, which can be collected if the player fills it with enough souls from defeated enemies (some Chalices are awarded via other means). If the player clears a level with a Chalice in hand, Dan is warped to the Hall of Heroes, where he can speak to a legendary hero who will give him rewards, such as weapons. If the player finishes the game with all the Chalices, the game's true ending is revealed.

name: Paraiso
description: Get the cup of immortality and escape the temple with all the treasures you can find!

name: Pursuit Force: Extreme Justice
description: This game is a sequel to the first Pursuit Force. This is a game which alternates between driving and shooting, in which you must keep Capital City safe from five ruthless and well-equipped gangs.

name: Animal Camp: Healing Resort
description:
Have you dreamed of escaping from ordinary life and just go farming?
Become an owner of a resort.
Run your own resort.
Collect various animal visitors,
and make your own healing resort.

name: Cat Heroes
description:
It is a defense game where the cats with different abilities prevent enemies from invading.
Merging the identical cats with same levels creates a higher phase cat to get stronger!
Combine heroes and build powerful decks to defend the planet from enemies!

name: Bear Heart Defense
description: It is a defense game where cute bears prevent hearts from invading.

name: Dungeon Sweeper KiKi
description: The world was turned into a dungeon due to the overflow of trash thrown away by humans, and the trash evolved into monsters.

name: Cats Link
description: Link the Cats and defeat the enemies!

name: Hammer Hero
description:
When all the weapons are gone,
wouldn't the world be peaceful again?

name: Hero Sword
description:
After facing defeat by the demon king, the warrior fell into a dimension where he reincarnated as a sword!

Summon great heroes as your allies and conquer foes with dazzling skills!

Save the world by becoming the greatest sword!

name: Blue Dungeon
description:
It's a defense game that purifies hearts with tears.
Summon tears to create fairies.
Merging the same number of the same fairies makes it stronger.
Collect fairies and build powerful decks to heal your hearts!

name: Noonkey: Healing Tears II
description:
1. Grow your happiness garden by crying.
2. Collect the fairies and hearts.
3. Meet the various garden elements.

name: My Hero Kitty
description:
Have you ever dreamed of becoming a hero who defeats villains?
Villains have invaded the peaceful cat world.
Go on an adventure to protect the cat world with small, cute but powerful hero cats!

name: Knights Combo
description: Knights Combo is a strategic mobile game that combines puzzle-matching, card RPG, and roguelike elements! Rally your heroes and embark on an epic journey! Link scattered elemental blocks on the board by connecting and unleashing skills! Deliver a devastating strike to the enemy with random roguelike skills.

name: Animal Town
description: Chestnut the squirrel needs your help to reopen the general store, and bring back life to the cute animal village! Meet the other inhabitants in this cute animal game, like the sheep, the monkey and the cat.

name: Merge Friends
description: Merge Friends is an addicting merge game, where players merge, trade, and help to rebuild an almost-forgotten community.

name: We are Monsters
description: Embark on an epic journey through the realms of fantasy as you summon mighty armies of mythical creatures, valiant heroes, and formidable spellcasters.

name: Cluck Avengers
description: After years of oppression, one courageous chicken decides to turn on the fast food industry that keeps turning him and his peers into delicious fried food.

name: Merge Rush Z
description:
What is the best way to deal with waves of zombie in an outbreak?
Merge guns and send in your deadly girl squad of course!

name: Spookyville
description: Who dares disturb the Witch Queen from her slumber?! Spookyville lies in ruins after 400 years, hiding its mysteries under the rubbles. You'll help the queen restore Spookyville to it's former glory and find out all about the mysterious past as your renovate the premises.

name: Mr Hero
description:
Mr. Hero has decided to defeat all the monsters around the world and become a social media superstar!
I’m gonna fight the strongest monsters and become the most famous hero in the world!

name: Super Ninja
description:
The best way to defend yourself is to attack!
All over the world, evil monsters are plotting to attack humans!
You, a super ninja, have been given the mission: defeat these hordes of monsters and return home safely!
Use the portals developed by genius scientists to infiltrate the monsters' bases!
However, the portal will close after a certain amount of time. You must defeat the boss monster and return in time!
You are the only hero who can save the world!

name: Ultimate DragonMaster
description: Sin descripción

name: Blade Crafter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Chickens VS Zombies
description: Sin descripción

name: Pome Rumble
description: Pome Rumble is a puzzle-based RPG game where players collect and grow their characters to defeat various enemies and explore an unknown planet.

name: Pome Rumble M
description: Pome Rumble M is a puzzle-based RPG game where players collect and grow their characters to defeat various enemies and explore an unknown planet.

name: Guardians: Unite the Realms
description: Can you save the Guardians and their Realms?

name: Board Heroes
description: Dive headfirst into the rollicking world of Board Heroes, a comic RPG game where you, the HERO, wield the power of the DICE!

name: Mystic Duel: Heroes Realm
description: Don't let the cards fool you, Mystic Duel isn't your typical card game! Discover a unique card control system and assemble the strongest deck of Heroes in the Mystic Arenas. Duel other players in short and intense PvP battles, where predicting your opponent is as important as your choice of heroes.

name: Resource War: Soul Squad Alpha
description: Welcome to Resource War: soul squad alpha, the exciting new multiplayer mobile game that puts you in the midst of a fierce warzone for resources on a distant planet. As a space marine, you'll need to use all of your combat skills and strategy to emerge victorious in this intense and brutal conflict, like a true knight.

name: Love & Diaries: Duncan
description: When was the last time you had a fresh start in the most exciting city in the world?  When was the last time you have pursue your dreams and made them actually happen? When was the last time you met your true love and fought in order to get him?

name: Heir of Love
description: Sin descripción

name: AnticLove
description: Anticlove is a game of mysteries and flirting, where you can follow Rachel and her friends' adventures!

name: Rising Lovers
description: Sin descripción

name: La Gran Alameda
description:
La Gran Alameda is a limit-removing map (complevel 2) set in the middle of a city under an otherworldly red sky. Make your way out of the facility and bring the fight to the rooftops! The city is completely infested, so watch out for fire coming from every direction.
This is not like the other bimonthly demon invasions though... This time they've brought some backup

name: Slugger
description: Slugger is a 10-15 mins short and punchy map for Doom 2

name: 2 Hours to Kill!
description: 2 Hours to Kill is a Doom II community speedmapping session in MBF21 format with a focus on refined combat. This set is split into 2 episodes depending on the kind of action: traditional Doom gameplay or slaughter.

name: Decomission
description: A map that was originally meant for a personal project that never happened. Mainly a brown storage facility with plenty of green foliage.

name: Embraced
description: Embraced is small set of 3 maps focusing on combat puzzle and slaughter(4th map progress stopper). Adding again to the green techbase crowd but this time with a lot of wood textures!

name: Escape From Sunveil Starport
description: Escape From Sunveil Starport is an MBF21 compatible mini-wad spanning 9 or so maps, initially created during NaNoWadMo2023. This project serves as a prequel to A2Rob's NaNoWadMo 2022 contribution, Machete. Initially, their plan was to ape off level concepts from Knee-Deep in the Dead.

name: Sanguine Holy Land
description: Sanguine Holy Land is a new episode for Doom 2 designed for limit removing source ports (complevel 2) made by the various members of Doomer Boards, lead by BiZ. The project theme was marble temples and blood rituals.

name: Rust
description: RUST is a 90s and Scythe-inspired project that aims to combine the early wad aesthetics of D!Zone style wads with the modern progression and fast-paced as wads like Scythe.

name: Rosy Rubicunda
description: A small 4-map (+ 1 intro and 1 credits map) collaborative wad between OverflowingMocha and Stephyesterday. Features somewhat tough microslaughter and a cute color palette.

name: Terror Signal
description: Terror Signal is a set of 17 maps(14 normal, 2 secret, 1 epilogue) designed for MBF21. It features new enemies along with some modified weapon and enemy behavior.

name: The Snowman
description: Platformer based in the book by Raymond Briggs.

name: Savage Pond
description: You have to build a colony of frogs.

name: Tomb Raider Collection 1
description: A legend begins! Tomb Raider Collection 1 for Evercade includes the first three published adventures of the world's most famous acrobatic archaeologist, including Tomb Raider, Tomb Raider II Starring Lara Croft and Tomb Raider III: Adventures of Lara Croft!

name: Tsumobaka Nisshi
description: You play a long-haired salaryman as he visits random clubs to play in 4-player mahjong against girls, who strip if they run out of funds. The games don't end until you either strip all of the girls or run out of funds yourself.

name: Forsaken Compound
description: Forsaken Compound is a limit-removing E1 replacement wad for Doom 1. There's a mix of action/slaughtery gameplay and more simple, atmosphere-oriented parts that require some thinking, overall intended to be more difficult than normal Knee Deep in the Dead-style mapping, as well as more visually distinct and varied than that episode. Texturing is all done from the IWAD with an excellent custom palette by Dir, and some sound replacements from Doom 64 and Doom 3.

name: Le Gars Qui A Fait Doom
description: "Le Gars Qui A Fait Doom" Level Collection is a series of 8 new Ultimate Doom maps for Limit Removing ports. They come in all styles and colors, and all of them are more or less inspired by John Romero, whether it's his old IWad maps, his modern offerings (SIGIL and its sequel), his other games, or even his real life. You can play each of these maps in any order you fancy, as there's no clear theme or difficulty order. Each wad can be played standalone, à la Master Levels, and some of them contain new textures and resources.

name: Sundown
description: The UAC has received reports of demonic presence in a mysterious desolate island that was the home of an ancient civilization.

name: Cannibal
description: Cannibal is an episode designed for Vanilla. It was inspired by Thy Flesh Consumed and Plutonia. Every map was required to include a section with a mandatory damaging floor, so bring your toughest boots!

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 3
description: You’ve seen her in a crown, now see her in Fortnite. Award-winning artist Billie Eilish is the Icon of Fortnite Festival Season 3!

name: Crate Expectations
description: Crate Expectations is a full megawad of random high concept maps that push limit removing to its limits and maybe the player too! Besides a connecting theme of interactive crates which you will learn about while playing, each map is designed to be totally random and surprising and keep you on your toes - stay sharp!

name: Doom 2 In City Only
description: Doom 2 In City Only is a 36 map megawad in MBF21 format featuring nothing but city maps. Some of these maps are very large, so it is recommended you play with OpenGL. The set was primarily tested in dsda-doom. There are 6 secret maps (one per episode) with the secret exit being in the middle map of each episode. Jumping and freelook are not intended for this set and will break some maps.

name: Machine Men
description: Machine Men is a single map with plenty of grunt set in an abandoned lava-strewn demonic foundry. The title is inspired by the Bruce Dickinson song of the same name.

name: Super Doom TV
description: Doomguy is off to fight in the biggest event in galactic history, Super Doom TV! Every eyeball on every creature on every planet will be tuned to broadcast-compliant screens everywhere to see him plow through 25 sectors of high definition carnage. Super Doom TV is a 25 map megawad where each map was given an arena title from the SNES classic Super Smash T.V. as a prompt for mappers to work from. ﻿

name: Lab Escape!
description:
Welcome little specimen!
You're the unstable... thingy captured by scientist.
Consume meats, select random Mutations, and Devour all bad guys in your sight!

name: Demon RPG
description:
The Demon who ruled Hell, betrayed!
The outskirts of hell, the adventure of the demon begins to get back the throne.

name: Idle Dessert Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Stellar!: Infinity defense
description:
Welcome, Captain!
In the current world ruled by robots, this is the only planet with life.
Alien robots are constantly trying to eliminate life on this planet
Protect the planet from alien robots!

name: Fishing Adventure
description:
You can fish for anything if you have a white sail, wind and a spear.
Old man's reckless voyage to the end of the ocean.
With personal combination of fish ability and spearing skills, catch the fish together with the old man!

name: Fart Up
description:
Finally, Mankind can fly with the power of farts.
With great power comes great responsibility. Take the carrot man to the sky safely with your fantastic control.

name: Lost Memories: Romance You Choose
description: Sin descripción

name: My Fake Boyfriend
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Kitty's Cube Frenzy
description: Sin descripción

name: Faceball 2000
description:
Faceball 2000 is a first-person shooter. You control a H.A.P.P.Y.F.A.C.E., or Holographically Assisted Physical Pattern Yielded For Active Computerized Embarkation. The graphics consist of flat shaded corridors. Enemies are all simple geometric shapes with smiley faces on them.

There are two modes of play. First there is a single player mode in which your goal is to find the exit to each level. There are 70 mazes in this mode. The second mode is the multiplayer arena. For the Game Boy: up to 4 Game Boys can be linked together in this mode.

name: Mickey to Ooki na Furudokei
description: Sin descripción

name: Beasties of Greenhollow
description: Beasties of Greenhollow is a strategic turn based team building game that features a collection of cute creatures based of Scottish mythology. Explore a mysterious realm of fairies, elves, magic, and creatures while fighting to the center of this hidden realm at the request of a mysterious masked figure. What are Shellycoat’s true intentions?

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story 2nd
description: A follow-up to The Quintessential Quintuplets: Quints Puzzle Story The Quintessential Quintuplets: Quints Puzzle Story2nd is a “memorial adventure game” featuring the events, cards, and stories from “The Quintuplets Can't Divide the Puzzle Into Five Equal Parts”, the October 27, 2020-released smartphone game based on The Quintessential Quintuplets, minus the puzzle game elements.

name: Porntris
description: An erotic version of the popular Tetris game developed by Image-Line.

name: Eat This
description: Eat This is a side-scrolling platformer in which the player controls a bald trucker named Leon. He has to fend off aliens invading the United States of America. Using various guns, rockets, and bombs the player has to kill aliens.

name: A Jornada
description: The player commands Sirey, the blue-haired kid. His first mission is very naïve, to clean the house’s backyard. Of course, things will soon get more complicated until Sirey fights for humankind's destiny against the alien invasion. For that, he’ll have to recover a robot project long forgotten, the Teenook.

name: A 2ª Jornada
description: Returning from Mars after defeating the aliens who were planning to invade Earth, Sirey and his friends must now help the scientists rebuild the ruined civilization. After many adventures, the aliens are striking back with an even stronger force.

name: Full Swing Golf
description: Full Swing GOLF Software - The most realistic golf simulation software in the industry. The best graphics and the best courses because your game deserves the best.

name: Invasão
description: About halfway through A 2ª Jornada, Sirey and his companions built 1 million Teenooks and sent them to the alien ships in orbit. And now you control just one of these robots, Teenook965421, who has infiltrated the tunnels of an alien mothership.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Special Edition
description:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Special Edition includes the base game and the Sabacc Shark Character Pack.

name: Star Wars Outlaws: Ultimate Edition
description:
Experience the first-ever open world Star Wars game, set between the events of The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi. Explore distinct planets across the galaxy, both iconic and new. Risk it all as Kay Vess, an emerging scoundrel seeking freedom and the means to start a new life, along with her companion Nix. Fight, steal, and outwit your way through the galaxy’s crime syndicates as you join the galaxy’s most wanted.

The Ultimate Edition includes the base game, the season pass, the Rogue Infiltrator bundle, the Sabacc Shark bundle, a digital art book, and 3 days early access.

name: A 3ª Jornada
description: After the destruction of Earth and Mars caused by the alien invasion, the human beings guided by Sirey are now living inside spaceships. Ten years after A 2ª Jornada, Sirey’s fleet is approaching a new solar system, where they’ll find a new planet... and new adventures.

name: The Boohbah Zone
description: The Boohbah Zone was a website and game promoting the Boohbah TV show, featuring a couple dozen minigames and interactive toys revolving around the 'atoms of energy' and various recurring characters in the show.

name: Spotlight!!!
description: A lighthearted tale about two childhood friends, Juanita Santos and Xiang Li, on a 'quest' to return a cellphone to their classmate, an admittedly forgetful but cute witch. Shenanigans ensue.

name: Townlore 2.0
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Worker
description:
Steel Worker is a reflex game that combines OH&S with the Japanese practice of just in time manufacturing. Each level starts with a mindless worker moving steadily from one side of the factory to the other along an incomplete gantry. To prevent the worker from falling to his doom, the player must select another piece of the gantry to be erected by the time the worker reaches the end of the current one. The process is repeated until the worker makes it to safety at the platform at the other end of the screen, or four workers have died. Complicating matters are a pair of elevators in the centre of the screen whose touch will be fatal to the steel worker.

There are five types of bridge that may be placed at any time: horizontal, slanting up, slanting down, staircase up and staircase down. A different selection needs to be made depending if the worker is moving left or right, giving a total of ten options. These are chosen using a cursor which can be moved left or right across the bottom of the screen and pressing the select button. There is also a reverse button which will turn the worker around, but this can only be performed a maximum of nine times in total. Points are awarded for adding parts of the gantry, and for the worker successfully crossing the screen.

name: DT Bloodmasters
description:
We don't have much information on DT 64 (also known as “Bloodmaster”): the game was supposed to be an Card RPG with an interesting connection-mode between the 64DD and the Game Boy. The game was in development by Marigul and Media Factory and probably it would have been published by Nintendo. The player had to collect a series of cards to use them in combat as in Magic The Gatering.

DT 64 was shown at the Space World 1999 in a non-playable form: there was just a logo and some text , with the GameBoy Link Cable, that would have been used to connect the two Nintendo consoles. The GameBoy could have been used as a controller for the 64DD game, to check the card statistics and share data with a presumed Bloodmaster GB version. The two games, one for the 64DD and one for the GB, would had exchanged data to integrate parts of the story and unlock new levels / cards. Players would have been able to play online with the 64DD Randnet Network, to trade cards and complete their collection.

In a scan from a Japanese magazine, we can read: “A controller with a brain.” Even if the translation is not accurate because an ideogram is hide by the reflection of the light, making it unrecognizable, the concept is certainly intriguing. Sadly DT64 was cancelled and it vanished without any more screens or info.

name: Teo 64
description:
Teo 64 was a pet simulation video game, very similar to “Hey You Pikachu!”, the Nintendo title where the player could interact with the Pokemon talking to him through a microphone connected to the N64. In this game, however, the protagonist was a strange cross between a dolphin and a bird. Speaking with the animal it was possible to became his friend, feed him and explore the world.
For many it will be a shocking news, but “Teo” is not the name of the dolphin / bird, but of the planet where he is living. Known under the title “FinFin on Teo, the Magic Planet”, the virtual puppy FinFin made his first appearance on a PC game released in 1996. According to the producers, the 64DD version was not a porting, but a completely new game. The development of Teo for 64DD was probably stopped because of the failure of the Disk Drive, and it is likely that we will never know how different the 64DD game was supposed to be.

The gameplay is harsh and combat is unforgiving, since casual shootouts without serious consequences are not what this codebase aims for; instead, it is about working in teams with different specializations between players as every character has a set of traits that define their parameters, in order to survive, uncover the secrets of the anomalous territories and learn how to make use and profit of your knowledge. name: My Drama Club Romance
description: You are the sole member of your school’s drama club and labeled as a weirdo by the rest of the school. However, you have a reason to continue to be a part of the club: you want to protect your childhood friend’s dreams and the place that she belongs.

name: Sweet Love Bite
description: Hidden behind a smokescreen of petty crime, the shadow council of vampires pulls the strings of governments and businesses worldwide. Despite their constant infighting, their influence has been strong enough to change the course of history, forcing society to conform to their will.

name: Pierced by Love
description:
Your dreams are coming true! You’ve finally been accepted into the Imagawa College kyudo team alongside your childhood idol!

But behind the curtain of prestige lie dark secrets that threaten to tear the club, and your budding relationship, apart.

name: Merchant Adventurer
description: An economic and political simulation that takes place in the late Medieval and early Renaissance ages. Players represent a family that attempts to gain wealth through business associations and governments throughout Europe. The game features share and bond investment, trading, taxes and tariffs, exploration, combat and mercenaries, diplomacy, charters, and piracy. Hundreds of historic civilizations from all around the world are playable.

name: My Kemono Girlfriend
description: In this game, you will be sharing a home with two sisters from abroad, the cold and refined Allison and the fun-loving and wild Erin.

name: Sealed with a Demon's Kiss
description: After losing your parents to an unexpected Demon attack, your longing for justice compels you to join the Order of the Exorcists and strike back the dark forces of the world. Along the way, three fearless companions join the fight to save Mankind and to keep you from endangering yourself.

name: Beautiful Blood
description: Trapped by two beautiful vampires... Is this heaven or hell?

name: As the Master Says
description: This story stars a young heir to a vast fortune who has lived in a giant mansion his whole life. He's spent most of it with two butlers, Vincent and Kain, who are like brothers to him. He likes to play tricks and is always making trouble for the level-headed Vincent.

name: Pandemonium: Infernal Bonds
description: Will old friends and new bonds be enough to save a Devil from his destiny?

name: Midnight Passions: Yakuza Rose
description: As a young child, your brother was abducted by the yakuza. With nothing but the memory of a blue rose tattoo to guide you, life ever since has been an endless pursuit to see the two of you reunited. When this search lands you in a deadly yakuza trap, your survival suddenly depends on the whims of three handsome but very different underworld figures.

name: Dating Start
description: After falling to the underground, you find yourself in a bed of golden flowers outside some ruins. This seems familiar, but instead of the usual ruins caretaker greeting you, you're met with an all too well-known grin. Dating Start is an Undertale Dating-Sim where you date the fan-favorite, Sans. Taking place after the last human arrived, This is your story and how you go about it is up to you. Will you find love? Or will you give LOVE?

name: Wubbzy's Bilingual Treehouse Laptop
description: Wubbzy's Bilingual Treehouse Laptop is an educational laptop LCD game based on the Wow! Wow! Wubbzy series developed and released by WinFun in 2009.

name: Fundamental Paper Education
description: Sin descripción

name: Universal Constellation
description: Universal Constellation is a Rom Hack for Super Mario 64, which is aiming to be the biggest SM64 Rom Hack ever made, with 832 total stars in its final release.

name: Cyber Fisk Kids Magic Way
description: Educational game exclusive for Fisk students.

name: Arcadia Files: Clyde
description:
The year is 1993.

Clyde Evansdale was murdered.

While it seems straightforward as to who did it and how he died (a bit like a game of Clue) there may, however, be more that's been left unsaid. With the spotty memories of a band ghost, a middle aged detective that needs all the help he can get, and your own intuition; put the pieces of Clyde's life and death together.

name: Cyber Fisk Teens
description: An educational game exclusive for Fisk students.

name: My Buddy Fisk
description: A pet simulator with Fisk's mascot, Buddy.

name: Leechcraft
description:
As a plague spreads through the isolated village you call home, balance your needs as a newly-turned vampire with your duties as a healer.

Leechcraft is interactive fiction with a healthy dose of role-playing, steeped in a dark fantasy world inspired by medieval medicine.

name: 26AZ: The Enigma of Shadows
description: The story follows the protagonist, Soga Koruo, a high school student with a passion for detective work. One day, a murder takes place at Crestwood High School, disrupting the usual monotony of student life. Despite the seriousness of the situation, Koruo feels a spark of excitement and embraces the opportunity to solve the mystery. As Korou delves deeper, he finds out that there is something supernatural at play.

name: Accuser
description: A night out takes a drastic turn as Iris' best friend is accused of a crime. She takes it upon herself to find the truth before her friend gets sent straight into a cell.

name: Alice Not More
description:
Alice Not More is a visual novel with a thriller theme, in which you take the role of a police psychologist who has to investigate a serial murder case. To do this we must enter into the mind of Alice, the suspect of the case.

She stays in the Chester psychiatric hospital. Our job is to determine what happened, unraveling the mysteries of Alice's past.

Is she the culprit or just another victim?

name: A Romantic Murder
description:
You play as Mae (or the name of your choice), a detective pried out of London to investigate the suspicious death of one Henry Graves.

But when you arrive at the dead man's country manor, things aren't quite as you expected. Your clients don't take you seriously, the staff is behaving suspiciously, and the will reading is one step from becoming a brawl.

On the bright side, there's no shortage of handsome men about the place.

Less cheerfully, some of them may shortly become murderers. Or corpses.

name: Asou Youichi no Jikenbo: Dochiraka ga Kanojo wo Koroshita
description:
The victim is Yasuha Shirai, a girlwho lives in a mansion.
She was shot dead in her bedroom.
The suspects were two men who claimed to be her boyfriend.
However, it is unclear which of the two killed her.
Who is the culprit?

name: A Train Mystery
description: In the game, you play a detective tasked with solving the murder of a famous film critic. There are three suspects: the Actress, the Banker, and the Understudy. You must interrogate each of them, choosing your questions carefully, and at the end make your accusation.

name: Cheree: Remembering My Murder
description: Cheree doesn't know how she died. Nor does she know why she doesn't know. By "traveling" to dozens of different locations and chatting with her about any topic that comes to mind, Cheree will gradually remember details, and the two of you will discover clues that lead to the answers she has been seeking for over 100 years.

name: Nearly Friendly Tribes
description: Join the action-packed world of Nearly Friendly Tribes (NFT), the low-poly First-Person Shooter by Block Bastards. Battle it out in beautifully designed arenas, armed with Interoperable weapons. Are you ready to dominate the competition?

name: Chizome no Hana
description:
In the middle of summer….

Kurisuno Sakura, along with her fellow Mystery Club Members (and the teachers supervising), decide on a trip to visit Utsugi Mansion – a place hidden in the woods where 10 years ago was known for a forced group suicide to have occured.

Soon after arrival, Sakura and co learn that the previos owner of the mansion, Utsugi Masagi, had been involved in the research of a very special flower – one who’s pollen would carry poison while displaying impressive regenerating ability. A person suffering from it would be gradually covered in red marks and then die, as some cases develop an extreme tendency for violence towards others in the meantime. On top of that, the poison itself is also contagious by blood.

Naturally it doesn’t take too long till one of them is also infected, so the battle for survival begins…

name: Chocolate Carol
description: Chocolate Carol is a short visual novel, where you sell hot chocolate to the locals. However, on one fateful night, an unfamiliar patron comes to you with news of a crime that occurred … very near your stall. Can you find the culprit with the clues each of the customers give you?

name: Blue Moon
description: Arcade space shooter

name: Tribble Trubble
description: Loosely based on the cult episode "The Trouble With Tribbles" from the original Star Trek series you are a tribbles farmer and have to guide a batch of your newly bred critters to safety.

name: City of Lost Hope
description: Welcome to the City of Lost Hope. You play as Jaron Mathis, a Private Investigator who recently left the Sector 3 Security in Lost Hope. Unravel the mystery that surrounds his past and dictate his future.

name: Cosmic Connection
description:
In the distant future, teams of barely-qualified astronauts are sent out on a hail mary mission to find a habitable planet for humanity to migrate to.

Your group is assigned to planet K2-288Bb orbiting a small star hundreds of lightyears out from our Solar System. Communication with Earth is impossible from this distance, so you have missions you must complete and then return to Earth with your findings.

The group dynamics go topsy-turvy when one of your crew members dies under mysterious circumstances. It's up to you to figure out who the culprit is and bring them to justice.

What choices will you make? Who will you trust, if anyone? With six endings, plus a secret ending, the possibilities are expansive.

name: Crime Investigation
description: Find the murderer and solve the case.

name: Dare ga Humpty wo Koroshita no?: Lizzie, Futatabi Tantei ni Naru
description: Baron Humpty, the owner of this mansion, was killed by an axe to the head. You (Lizzie) must search for the culprit with your assistant black cat, Dinah.

name: Anno 1800: Steampunk Pack
description: Give your city a more alternative look! Between art and science, the Steampunk Pack will let you adopt a style inspired by a path yet untaken for the Industrial Revolution, thanks to more than 18 new ornaments and skins for your city.

name: The Runes of Zendos
description: The Runes of Zendos, sequel to The Oracle's Cave, is a game in which the merry principality of Dorcasia is conquered by the evil wizard of Zendos, and the player must rescue the twelve months that the wizard has trapped in a hidden hourglass.

name: FBI-13
description: FBI-13 is an arcade russian game where the player must face several enemies with an helicopter.

name: The Masculine Urge
description:
[British accent]

hi,
welcome,

The Masculine Urge is a trap game, meaning you have to find hidden traps

name: RageBall
description: RageBall is modern take on a classic game retro style game. A dynamic arcade game with fast paced gameplay and engaging mechanics. RageBall is a 2d animation sports game, that pits player against player. Can you overcome the Rage?

name: Trenchpunk
description: A dieselpunk Wolfenstein 3d inspired first person shooter.

name: Limerence
description:
a short story of a captive and a captor chatting over dinner. not so much horror but more a tense, uneasy atmosphere and an imbalance of power. named after the yves tumor song of the same name, part of the art without blood universe, but you aren't required to play the [currently] demo to understand this game. based on an unpublished set of poems.

made for the O2A2 jam. this jam has restrictions that require 1 cg (or sprite and background), 1 sound effect, 1 bgm, and 1k words.

this game is about 5-10 minutes in length.

name: Kiki the Nano Bot
description: kiki the nano bot is a 3-D puzzle game, basically a mixture of the games Sokoban and Kula-World.

name: Relive Your Life
description: All people lead different lives. The direction they take is decided by your actions, your successes, and your failures. What would you do if you could live your life again? Start off as a sperm cell, and play through a series of integrated mini-games that change the course of your life. There are 29 different endings!

name: Green Top
description: The Robot World has been taken over by copper-eating grass. Will you be able to get rid of the plague as a copper robot to return the world to its former mechanical glory? Dive into the adventure in this puzzle platformer metroidvania where climbable surface is an expendable resource!

name: Fallout: Vault 13
description: Fallout: Vault 13 is a remake of Fallout 1 in the Fallout 4 engine.

name: DarlingHoney!
description:
Aurora works part-time as a gravedigger and the routine is starting to bore her. One night, however, she - somewhat accidentally - pulls an undead boy named Eden out of his grave. Fascinated by her at first sight, he promises to do anything to turn her life into the thrilling adventure she always dreamed of. From then on, Aurora's desires range from solving mysteries to bringing down the government and of course finding out just who or what in the world her strange friend is...

Episode 1 / Imaginary Motive: Cold Love

Episode 2 / Last stop. All out.

name: Winter Mission
description: A short, but challenging Zero Mission hack. No special manouvers beyond basic shinespark are required to beat this hack, neither are wall jumping or infinite bomb jumping.

name: Deadly Attachment
description: It's been 4 years since Samantha last saw her stepbrother Daniel. Suddenly he comes back home for her eighteenth birthday with his new girlfriend Jess. Sam can't be any happier - she always adored Dan and missed him terribly. But their reunion is ruined with the news of Jess' death. Police considers it to be a robbery, but Sam sensing something fishy, decides to start her own investigation.

name: Age of Defense
description: An action defense game, play 40 levels in 8 ages, battle against 32 characters, use 37 weapons, spells, effects, and unlock 34 achievements! You are brave warrior armored by 3 type of weapons: Thrown Object, Arrow and Gun, your objective is to protect your base from the enemy onslaught at all cost!

name: Call of the Void
description: "Call of the Void" picks up where "Call of the Machine" leaves off. With our protagonist trapped in the void, suddenly, they hear a voice in their mind. The entity speaking identifies itself as one of the ancient gods Vadrigar, who proposes to the protagonist to escape the void by sending them on a new mission for revenge against the Stroggs. This is in response to the Stroggs transforming the fallen Vadrigars (Chton and Shub Niggurath) and their followers into partially mechanical creatures in the service of the Strogg leader Makron.

name: Kokomando
description: A 3D platformer about a young rooster. The rooster's henhouse was attacked by foxes and he must rescue the hens.

name: Hit Single
description: Sin descripción

name: Rai-Net Access Battlers
description: Board game based on the fictional Steins;gate universe game of the same name.

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 13: Slayer
description: Adds Slayer to the roster of playable characters

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Battle Stage: Amber Fest with Kind Neighbors
description: The additional battle stage "Amber Fest with Kind Neighbors" becomes selectable in-game.

name: Mencabrona
description: This Simulation puts you in the skin of a filthy supermarket stealer. It's a idle game made for Fuck Capitalism Jam 2023.

name: Boyz Don't Cry
description: Boyz Don't Cry is a Polish adventure game with hand-drawn 2D backgrounds, and a loose sequel to the popular Polish comedy movie "Chłopaki nie płaczą" aka "Boys Don't Cry". The game focuses on two characters from the movie, Fred and Grucha, a pair of gangsters.

name: Diablo IV: Loot Reborn
description:
Become the hero of your choosing. With a newly improved itemization system, the power is in your hands to craft the weapons of your dreams. Temper your gear with a new crafting system to face down hordes of enemies in the updated Helltides. Achieve the pinnacle of your build through Masterworking and try your hand at the daunting challenge of the Pit.

The armies of Hell are expanding their reach across the world of Sanctuary. New threat system, enemies, Blood Maiden boss, and events. Join the Iron Wolves in this seasons’ activities and fight to beat back the tides of Hell, earning you Reputation and rewards.

name: Death of the Artificer
description:
The planet H-004 has only five inhabitants: a reclusive scientist, a paranoid doctor, a scrappy mechanic, a shady mining executive, and a surprisingly human-like AI system.

If your intel is right, one of them is a murderer.

Play as Hordeus Sung, an IA agent sent by ICARUS (Intergalactic College of Animatronics, Robotics, and Universal Science) to investigate the death of Dante Gallagher, H-004's late Superintendent.

Remember: not everything is as it seems, and loneliness… is everywhere.

name: Extraordinary Detective Marshall
description: The year is 2008. A series of murders has been shaking up the town of East Orenji for the past two years. Will you, Detective Marshall, be able to uncover the truth behind these seemingly unconnected incidents?

name: Gigantic Gear
description: A mecha game in which the player alternates between 2D side scrolling stages and rail shooter segments. The player mecha has a wide variety of customization.

name: Face 2 Face
description:
In a disturbing turn of events, Richter Farlane, renowned boss of the Japanese multi-media company Artemis, has been found dead. Now, the investigation rests on your shoulders! You'll have to question the various suspects, collect crucial clues and combine them skillfully! Mix two clues to create a delicious cocktail (and, incidentally, a new lead).

Face to Face is an investigative visual novel based on a system of combining clues to uncover new leads, and find the killer!

name: Eye of the Storm
description:
This mod is sequel to already done and released mod for HL2 - Ravenholm, where you find something about John's story.

The mod was planned to bring two episodes, while fully released first episode in 2009, EOTS: Ep Two had an incomplete release (A Demo) in 2010, due to the developer having moved to do Starcraft 2 Maps instead of continuing to work on Source Engine at the time.

name: Just Two
description: A murder mystery where some ladies go ghost hunting till someone ends up dead

name: Super Happi Quest 3
description: "Super Happi Quest 3" is an RPGMaker game featuring the popular Happi Cat meme. Embark on a whimsical adventure filled with colorful characters, quests, and humor. Explore a vibrant world with nostalgic pixel art. It's a lighthearted RPG experience with a touch of internet culture.

name: Dziedzic: A Book of Unanswered Questions
description:
The family gathering is for Miłosz Dajski an opportunity to meet family members he hasn't seen for a long time. While wandering around the palace he hasn't been to for years, he encounters a man who is claiming to be his cousin, however Miłosz can't seem to recall him.

The awkward encounter soon turns into horror when the mysterious relative finally announces "someone is plotting an attack." At the same time, there is a dispute between the descendants of the family head over inheritance issue and who will take over the leadership. Does this have anything to do with the "planned attack"?

name: Batman: Arkham Shadow
description:
Gotham City is in danger. And you’re the only one who can save it.

Prepare to enter Gotham for a new story set in the Batman: Arkham franchise.

name: Doll Recollect
description: A young girl named Barako ends up trapped in a mansion with eleven magic dolls, with a size and anatomy different to humans in order to play a death game where each murder will put the life of one of Barako's three friends on the line.

name: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom
description: Fadin's Vacation in the Parallel Kingdom is a 2D action-platformer that combines elements of Shoot 'em up, Beat'em up, and Metroidvania to challenge players. Explore the parallel realm with Fadin and embark on exciting adventures while facing formidable enemies and uncovering hidden secrets.

name: Bird Jumper
description: Bird Jumper is a platform puzzle game where you need to guide a hungry bird to eat all the worms! Navigate through dangerous obstacles and strategically plan your route to avoid deadly traps

name: Kona Project
description:
When she suddenly found herself in an unknown hospital ward, she couldn't remember even her name. She didn't remember her name, how she got there, and most importantly - who she was. In her memory, there was only a field overgrown with equally white flowers, and calm, tired voice... A locked door haven't given any hope for escape - from that crushing emptiness around, from that emptiness in her heart.
But once she will hear her name from that stranger, she will never be able to forget...

name: Cubin
description: Cubin is a first-person platform puzzle game that immerses you in the LGA experience. Complete 60 experiments to discover the truth about this simulation.

name: Pikmin 2 Regrown
description: A mod for Pikmin 2 with streamlined mechanics, remixed overworlds+caves and a new boss enemy. Project lead by Rakton

name: Game with Friends
description: It's a virtual hangout game that aims to bring you together with your friends and have a good time. This platform promises to give you unforgettable moments by combining the fun competition of board games, the excitement of arcade-style racing and the different experiences offered by various games and entertainment.

name: MapleStory Mayple Island
description: Happy 19th anniversary, MapleStory! Explore the numerous events, mini-games, and shops filled with one-of-a-kind goodies at Mayple Island. Experience the adorable new class, Forest Child Lynn, and her versatile kit that will be influential in any party environment. Play through the newly revamped [Hieizan] Theme Dungeon with quality of life and balance improvements. Organize your outfits and decorate all your characters with the return of the Cash Shop Transfer event. Create a Zero character at any time of the year now that Zero creation is no longer limited to specific seasons!

name: High Stakes
description:
A Halloween party gone wrong; one of the attendees ends up staked in the heart with a witch's broomstick. Who could have done such a thing?

Listen to suspect's stories and view the case photos to find the truth behind what happened that night. Not everything you hear may be the truth, however.

name: Intersection
description:
Sergeant Yoon Seunghyun is transferred to the 12th District's Central Civil Affairs Department. The young policeman meets an experienced partner, a strong mercenary and a charming hacker. Forming a team, they investigate the murder of a young girl. However, the deeper they dig into the case, the more mysteries emerge.

Immerse yourself in criminal intricacies by choosing one of three ways of plot's development. Solve the case, together with an extraordinary team and uncover the darkest secrets of the alternative world of the Intersection.

name: Smalland: Survive the Wilds VR
description: From the world of Smalland: Survive the Wilds, immerse yourself into a new epic single-player adventure as a Smallfolk in a gigantic world. After centuries living underground, the Smallfolk emerge from their burrows to reclaim the Overland now that the giants have gone. Explore, scavenge, craft and build as you fight to gain a foothold in this hostile new world.

name: Aliens: Redacted
description: Aliens: Redacted is a fan-made retro-style 2.5D shooter set in the Alien universe in the year 2171. You take on the role of Sgt. Braun Rodriguez, a mercenary for the Weyland-Yutani Corporation, tasked with investigating a distress call from the prison transport USS Boethiah crash-landed on LV-059, a planet suspected of Xenomorph activity.

name: Bela Kovacs and the Trail of Blood
description: Sin descripción

name: Synapsis
description: Sin descripción

name: Synapsis 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Sylviana: Ai Ippai no Boukensha
description: Sin descripción

name: Decision
description:
Decision is the 1st game of the Decision series, you play a survivor who decides to liberate a city from zombies.

Recon territories, destroy enemies, capture factories and towers, upgrade weapons and abilities. Capture and pump up each area.

name: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-tan: Eigou-kai Jiken
description:
July 1999 - The world situation has lost its balance and is in great turmoil. The circumstances and perspectives of the four characters become intricately intertwined, and the full picture of the incident soon emerges...
The meeting between Ikuo and Kibukawa is also now revealed!

name: Condemned
description: Condemned is a small Heretic episode designed explicitly for ZDoom. There are 6 normal levels, 1 atmospheric interlude level, and 1 secret level.

name: Die Rowdy
description: Die Rowdy is a 44 map megawad created as the thirty-third edition of the Pineapple Under the Sea Speedmapping series in December of 2023. Loosely Christmas themed and highly Die Hard themed, each map was made with a skyscraper prefab and an elevator, courtesy of ViolentBeetle's Hellavator, of which players will be required to find a red keycard in order to advance to the next floor.

name: Endoom Mapping Contest 2024
description:
The ENDOOM Mapping Contest 2024 was an event organized by endoomer, the member of LegacyZ and the Russian Doom Community, on Doom Power forum. The task was to create a brand new level in a decent period of two months on a favorite theme, using any suitable resources, formats (from the list) and source ports. The map creation period lasted from January 3, 2024 to March 3, 2024.

All maps were divided into two independent groups corresponding to their formats.
Classic group: Vanilla, Limit-removing, Boom, MBF21.
Modern group: ZDoom, GZDoom, Eternity, Zandronum.

name: Evil Returns
description: Evil Returns is a 32-map megawad. There ﻿are various styles of maps including various themes such as easy maps, small, medium & large maps, puzzle maps, a couple joke maps, slaughter style, high-contrast, hell-themed, tech base, and even a hotel-themed map.

name: Lineal Distancing
description: Lineal Distancing is a community project with the gimmick of for ﻿each 1024x1024 block from the origin, no more than 64 linedefs can be placed.

name: Maiden Voyage
description: For some, a maiden voyage may end in disaster...A 32 Map Limit Removing Megawad designed for pistol starting.

name: The North
description: A PS1 style exploration game. Talk to NPCs and try to solve a murder onboard an arctic icebreaker ship trapped in the ice. You play as Doctor David Barclay, the ship's surgeon and the one man above suspicion. Interact with the crew to get clues but beware, you are not a well liked or respected member of the HMS Ectorius.

name: Goodnight Universe
description: You are Isaac, a 6-month-old baby, developing mysterious psychic powers. What you want most is to be loved and accepted by your family, but a secretive tech corporation wants you for their own.

name: Bubble Shooter 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Frutakia
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: This Game Gear port of the Sega Master System version makes some changes to emerald locations and bosses.

name: Oneiro Man
description: Oneiro Man is a 30-minute game aiming to be fun and humorous. In it, you'll have to write reports and play various mini-games. The game features 3 different endings, depending on your performance at work.

name: Eleven Beat World Tournament
description: An arcade football game featuring international teams. Play a friendly against a friend or play a tournament against CPU players.

name: Oswald's Supermarket
description:
An arcade game based on a supermarket. Oswald, a shop assistant, is not too pacient and will be annoyed if you organize the products of the supermarket badly.
Win points, multiplicators and do not end being mad!

name: Idle Colony
description: A condensed incremental experience, where you build a colony to collect and merge bigger and bigger fruits. Combine game-changing technologies and special upgrades to find the best synergies and take your cash flow to another dimension.

name: A Faerie's Tale
description: A Faerie's Tale is a light-hearted and playful fantasy story about accepting change and finding a new home.

name: A 1-2-3
description: A compilation of the 3 Ayayo-san games.

name: Abel: Shin Mokushiroku Taisen
description: Abel is a turn-based Japanese-style RPG set in a dark futuristic environment. The player commands Abel and his teammates from the headquarters, where they can rest, receive items, and prepare for the next mission. The missions themselves take place in large dungeon-like areas. Randomly appearing enemies must be defeated in first-person perspective combat with a rather standard system: characters either attack physically, use items, or execute special attacks that require "special points" (equivalent to magic). There is also an Auto option for battles.

name: Abunai Tengu Densetsu
description: Abunai Tengu Densetsu is an adventure game with menu-based navigation and input. Most screens offer a fairly long list of verb commands, some of which must be combined with objects or persons selected from a sub-menu in order to interact with the environment. The game allows the player to visit many different rooms and other locations in any order; however, certain events must be triggered in order to advance, sometimes by repeatedly selecting commands. Certain situations require the player to find items and use them in a different location.

name: Dejig: Tin Toy
description: A jigsaw puzzle game for the Sega Saturn in which players build images of children's toys based around vehicles, machinery, or industry.

name: Air Combat II Special
description: Sin descripción

name: Akiko Gold: The Queen of Adult
description: Sin descripción

name: Akiko Premium Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice no Yakata 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice no Yakata CD
description: Sin descripción

name: Alice no Yakata CDII
description: Sin descripción

name: Amy to Yobanaide
description: Sin descripción

name: Angel
description: Sin descripción

name: Angel Halo
description: Sin descripción

name: Arabesque: Shoujo-tachi no Orinasu Ai no Monogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Arquelphos
description: Sin descripción

name: MasterChef: Learn to Cook!
description: If you enjoy cooking games or want to explore new recipes in a fun and interactive way, then MasterChef: Learn to Cook! It might be worth checking out. Get matched with other players around the globe. Choose your ingredients, slice, prepare, plate and serve delicious dishes with style in fun mini-games! The MasterChef judges will evaluate your dish based on your performance and speed. Complete and unlock new recipes, challenges, and mini-games along your cooking journey. MORE THAN 120 RECIPES!

name: Qusha
description:
In "Exorcism", a game in the style of Vampire Survivors, you gain experience and currency to strengthen your magical abilities and attributes by slaying massive amounts of demons with your ever increasing magical powers.
It is a course example for an indie game creator class launched by Lao V and Mo Hua and therefore is not particularly long, but free to experience for everyone.

name: Perimeter: Legate Edition
description: Perimeter is a real-time strategy game with a destructible world. Utilize the environment for resource gathering and defense against enemies. Immerse yourself in the millennia-spanning history of the Chains of Worlds and lead a faction in the struggle for survival.

name: MudRunner VR
description: The Ultimate Off-Road Experience In VR - Face the challenges of harsh weather and terrain in fully immersive VR for the first time! Tackle treacherous mud, fierce rivers, rocky paths, and more, to reach your goals.

name: A Matching Game
description: This is a simple, single player game of selecting two cards and trying to find more matches than your opponent. The further you get into the levels, the more difficult the opponent gets.

name: The Sleeping Sickness
description:
The Sleeping Sickness is an interactive short story that allows the player to guide the main character's actions.

Each day, the player chooses where Grayson investigates. The player’s choices will lock and unlock future locations, change dialogue, and alter the story. Choices matter in The Sleeping Sickness.

While The Sleeping Sickness includes sounds, graphics, and interactive sections, it focuses on the story.

The game is designed to play like a choose-your-own-adventure book and is an excellent choice for horror fans, avid readers, and lovers of creepy pastas.

name: Hairy Trees Massacre
description:
When Lucy was 10 years old, she and her dad were attacked by a giant hairy humanoid while on a camping trip. Lucy managed to escape but her father was taken by the creature and he was never seen again.
20 years later, Lucy returns to the forest where her father was taken, in order to face her fears and get closure. Instead, she'll get a....

name: Magneboy

town of Baby
lazy baby game stitched together from photos and old assets + scribbles

name: Danganronpa: Monokuma Strikes Back
